111.content:
1. Shiver (Glaceon) (Normal) (Champion)

2. Male

3. Character Bio

If you don't know who Shiver is, you probably don't even know what the Tournament is. Shiver the Glaceon was the sole champion of the Tournament for five whole years before a massive advertising campaign by Huge Industries sparked the massive influx of foul smelling challengers that gave birth to the Champion roster seen today.

When he first became Champion, Shiver was cold, cruel, and extremely egotistical. However, after getting knocked off his high horse by his later-to-be girlfriend, Blaze, and a few other Challengers, he went absolutely nuts. He trained and trained for days on end before going on this massive revenge spree, that ended when his cousin was kidnapped by another Champion.

Despite all he had done, other Champions still came to help him, and Shiver's heart warmed up after that. He became a lot more friendly and open to those around him.

Not long after, Shiver joined Jason the Dewott in a venture to the Dungeon of the Secret Stat. And, while he and Jason were successful in acquiring Lethal vials to increase their power, it came at a cost. Shiver's brain had been through the wringer in that place, and he came out with a massive stink fetish. So while he has obtained incredible levels of stench, he also rarely even uses it!


4. Stink Stats:
Feet: Lethal
Farts: Lethal
Body Odor: Lethal
Butt: Lethal
Breath Lethal

5. Stink Resistance: 99/100

6. Special Abilities:

Ice Control: Shiver can freeze people and objects, making surfaces slippery, or opponents entirely immobile.

Stink Fetish: Shiver has a huge fetish for stink, and may not fight altogether is his opponent smells bad enough!

The Smelly Snowstorm: Shiver's ultimate move. He infuses one of his awful farts with a blizzard attack, and coats the entire arena in a rotten, green storm of putrid snow!

7. Sex Is allowed. Shiver has no gender preference, and sex is allowed with anyone.

11121.content: I let out a sigh and stretch my toxic, icy body as I wait for you to arrive. I'd heard something about a new contestant wanting to challenge me, and while I don't think that's a good idea at all, I'm excited to see a new face around here. I just hope you don't pass out before getting into the ring like the last guy. I look around at the audience. The first few rows are bare save for a few hardcore stink lovers, and a few Pokemon who've already passed out. I grin and point my ass over at a section of the crowd. I give the fans a wink before letting out a Lethal charged fart that leaves the top rows gasping for air. The lower rows pretty much all pass out from the stench. "Ahhh, that was a great warm-up! Now where's the new guy?"
11121.title: "Accept Challenge?"

111211.content:
After a couple moments, you hear someone call out "Ah, here we are! Got a little lost, unfortunately. Sorry, I'm sure your schedule is absolutely packed." You see the Mightyena you were waiting for enter the arena, trotting in with a friendly smile and looking around curiously at the arena, the somewhat puzzled and eager audience, and. "Ah, so this is what this arena looks like from this perspective. Well, greetings, Champi--ACK!" As he gets closer, he gets a whiff of your latest release and starts coughing and hacking madly. After a few moments though, he seems to recover somewhat, and starts trying to talk through the nausea. "Ahh dear, so that's what you smell like this close. Uhh--oh, yes! Call me... call me Russ. You're Shiver, correct?"
He's clearly not used to a smell of this caliber, though relatively speaking, he's taking it much better than one would expect. Though his eyes are watering and it's clear he's sick to his stomach already by his gait, he's still managing to walk and his tone is still just as amiable as it was when he walked in. Even so, it's clear it won't take much effort on your part to absolutely destroy this guy.
111211.title: Yeah, he's definitely new here.

112.content:
1. Tanya (Zangoose) (Normal)

2. Female

3. Character Description

Personality:
Tanya is cold and distant, though not inherently cruel. Almost always angry, and when she isn't, it's rather easy to get her there. So basically... typical Zangoose stuff. She also harbors an intense hatred of slavers given her own experience as a stink slave. Though under all that hate and rage is a heart that hasn't known kindness and love for years. And if shown any, she can quickly become quite warm.

Background:
Tanya "Venom tooth" Ripclaw was once one of the most ferocious and feared Zangoose pack leaders around. But that... was four years ago. Until one fateful day, she was ambushed by slavers while foraging, and taken to be broken into a slave. Now, a ferocious warrior such as her wouldn't go down easily. She resisted their tactics for three whole years. But one day, she finally cracked. For all the trouble she'd put them through, the slavers decided to keep her for themselves rather than sell her. Tanya spent the next year happily inhaling farts, sucking pits, and licking feet without a care in the world other than pleasing her masters. That is, until the slavers were finally caught and arrested. Tanya was rehabilitated afterwards, but was never the same. Rather than find her pack, Tanya dedicated her life to becoming as disgusting as possible, do do unto any slavers what had been done to her. Revenge became her only goal, and that's when she heard about the tournament. A breeding ground for the scum she so wished to destroy. The only problem was that spending a year as a slave had considerably weakened her willpower. But she didn't care. Not in the slightest. She wanted one thing, Revenge. And she was going to have it!

Butt (Without Farting): Unbearable
Breath: Deadly x2 (Deadly x3 when poisoned)

6. Abilities

Toxic Boost: When poisoned, all of Tanya's stats that are Deadly or above get a 50% increase in strength.

Venom tooth: One of her sharp teeth is laced with a homemade poison. Tanya can inject herself with it at any time by biting down on her cheek or arm.

Berserk: When poisoned, Tanya loses all control and will stop at nothing to destroy her opponent. She cannot be mind controlled in this state, but she tends to be a bit... single-minded.

Enhanced fortitude: After so much training with poison, Tanya can tough out the pain for hours before dropping.

Bone Dry: Despite her body reeking like an army of Skuntank jogging up the side of a volcano, her fur, pits, and butt are completely dry. Her feet still sweat though.

Shattered Will: Despite once having an iron will, her time as a stink slave has crushed it. When not poisoned, Tanya is very susceptible to mind games and can easily slip back into her slave like ways with the right push.

7. Sex with just about anything is allowed. She doesn't really have a preference since she hates everyone equally.

After obtaining his Champion status, and his infamous reputation, Swyft came across the one individual with the power to defeat him. Lucy. Your eyes caught a trace of a strange glimmer in the air above you. A small metallic ball, about the size of a tennis ball, sailed through the air, before landing in the middle of the ring. A trio of ports opened up on the orb, and released high-pressure blasts of a thick green fog that carried a distinctly fart-like odor! The green fog obstructed your view for a few moments, and when the smoke cleared, you were looking right at me, a Kirlia in a full-body black ninja suit. The imprint of a smile can be seen from under by cowl, and I walk backwards to stand in my corner, looking you over.

"Hmm... You're the legendary Swyft? I expected someone... bigger." I say as I hold a stubby hand to my chin. "What a shame. This won't take any time at all!"

At this point, you...
1152111.title: A stunning entrance!

I could've kidnapped three Pokemon for test subjects instead of just waiting for your scrawny, pale ass. Now I'm only getting one. Gee thanks." I let out an exasperated sigh. You really have no freaking clue who you're dealing with, do you? Ah well, I'll be sure to teach you. "Well, you're right about one thing, I suppose..."

Wilhelm von Clausewitz Halcyon (Audino)
Male

Clause is a rich Audino who inherited a large fortune at a young age. He was taught to be very proper and clean, but this bored him as he refused to clean and developed chronic flatulence. As he got older, he learned about his strong psychic powers, practicing them day in and day out until he perfected his technique. He often tortured his servants with his musk and farts, the feeling of which made him very proud. Despite this, he was still well spoken and surprisingly polite. But eventually, Clause got bored of stinking up the same old butlers, and decided it was time to leave the mansion. He had heard of an arena where Pokémon come to battle with their musk and stink, which piqued his interests. Could this be what he was looking for? Perhaps he could even find a new servant or two, a dedicated stink slave! It would be perfect. Clause put it at the top of his priorities to win and become a champion.

Stink Stats
Feet: Rancid
Farts: Deadly x2
Body Musk: Rancid
Butt (Without Farting): Deadly x2
Breath: Rancid

Stink Resistance (70 out of 100)

Abilities
Gravity Manipulation: Clause can control gravity and manipulate it at will. He uses this in two ways. One, he can manipulate the gravity around him to lift himself off the ground. And two, he can pin the enemy from a medium distance, however he can only do this for short periods of time.

Psychic Singularity: An ability mostly for defense, Clause can create small black hole-like masses that deflect oncoming ranged attacks, regardless of whether they are physical or energy based.

Clouding the Mind: If Clause makes close eye contact with his opponent, he can render his enemy helpless by dizzying them with illusions.

Bubble O' Stink: Clause can trap his gas in strong psychic bubbles and send them at his opponent. They're very difficult to pop, meaning Clause will be the one to decide when the miasma inside is released.

Teleportation: Clause can warp around the battlefield at will, confusing his opponent.

Kink for Stink: While he'll never outright reveal it, Clause rather turned on by stink. Though he's great at ignoring it and keeping it under control, the more he is dominated by it, the harder a time he has resisting it. In addition, the more aroused he is, the weaker his psychic attacks will be.

14.title: Reserved for MagnificentMudkip's characters

141.content:
Name: Mags
Species: Mudkip
Gender: Male

Personality: Mags is an energetic Mudkip with a go getter attitude. He has a cheerful and friendly demeanor, but can get a bit rowdy and competitive. If Mags ever thinks something sounds fun, you can be certain he's going to do it, regardless of consequences. He's brave and virtually fearless but is also prone to recklessness and getting in over his head. still, Mags is never one to quit or back down and always sees things to the end, no matter how sweet or bitter it may turn out.

Story: Mags was born and raised in a swamp; a rather smelly swamp. In fact, there were few times where he ever actually left it since everything he and his family needed was right there. Ever since Mags learned his first attacks, he was using them to annoy and wrestle his sibling. always for fun of course. as he got older, he would challenge other swamp dwellers to battles, becoming rather good at them.
On occasion, Mags would wander out of the swamp, just to see what lied beyond the tree line. it was his first visit to the areas outside the swamp that he realized something rather prominent. Mags really really stunk, as many Pokémon he came across made very clear to him. At first he felt bad about hearing that. he had never heard anyone say anything about him in the swamp. after spending a few days out here before returning, that's when he realized why nobody had ever brought it up before. The entire swamp stunk. It stunk to the point where pokemon who didn't live there would take the long way around just to avoid having to pass through it. however, Mags didn't mind the smell, after all, it was the smell he'd known his whole life.
Eventually, word got around in the swamp that there was a tournament designed specifically for smelly pokemon. many residents of the swamp grew excited by the idea, including Mag. It sounded like just the thing for him. Still, he didn't want to just rush out. he knew he had to train for it, learn to master his stink that his upbringing in the swamp had granted him. Eventually feeling satisfied with his progress, Mags traveled out into the world in hopes of proving his abilities to others and himself.

After Defeating and befriending Jason, Mags became a champion. After retrieving the Champion Serum, Mags returned to his home for a while for further training. Now stinkier than ever, He's returned to prove himself as a champion, make more friends, and perhaps find ways to become even stinkier!

Stink Stats:
Feet: Deadly
Farts: Deadly x3
Body Musk: Deadly
Butt (without farting): Deadly x2
Breath: Deadly x7
Water attacks: Deadly x2
Stink Resistance: 75
Special Abilities:

Swampy Water: Growing up in a swamp has forever morphed his water attacks into horrible swamp water which not only smells terrible, but created a lingering stench on soaked targets.

Swampy Terrain: From the start of battle, Mags is always working to turn the arena into a swamp with his water moves. as the arena becomes covered in more swampy terrain, the ground becomes muddy and the air is filled with a gradually thickening haze. pools of water also begin to linger, granting Mags an distinct advantage in this environment. The ambient odor also increases to resemble Mags's home, Assaulting Mags's opponent with constant odor.

Stinky Bubbles: Most of Mags's gas attacks come out in the form of a stream of gas filled bubbles. As a result, when the gas is within the bubbles, it does not create any sort of smell. however, when they do eventually burst, the smell is released, creating a surge of stench as more bubbles pop. the bubbles also make his gas long ranged. The streams of bubbles can be dodged however and the stench avoided entirely. If the bubbles make contact with a target, they pop with a sting and when bombarded, can knock opponents off balance keeping them trapped with the stench and any bubbles that want to pop on them. it also soaks the target a little.
Mega Stinky Bubbles: Instead of a stream of bubbles, Mags can blow large amounts of gas into a single large bubble before releasing it to pop on his opponents. even if it doesn't directly hit them, the blast radius can still get them with stink. and even stagger them if they are close enough. While the bubble is being blown, it is rather resilient, a a result, opponents can be caught and engulfed inside the bubble and forced to deal with the stink until it pops. This also bodes true for Mags as well if a crafty opponent manages to push him into his bubble or find a way to push it onto him. It is also possible to pop it with enough force.

Water gun: Mags can fire a thick and powerful jet of water out of his mouth to knock opponents around and soak them in it's horrible smell.

Hydro Pump: A much more forceful water gun. Mags uses this attack more often in an effort to flood the arena.

Mud Sport: Mags loves to make mud. not only does the muddy terrain eventually become swampy if he keeps up his water moves, but it also increases his bodily odors by two levels when he is covered with it. it's also quite sticky and will cling to opponents to assault them with odor and reduce their speed. She also suffers trust issues, which has also contributed to her aforementioned defensive demeanor, and tends to be wary of anyone she's never spend sufficient amounts of time with. Beneath her hardened exterior, she really is a kind person who will stick her neck out for others. In fact, she even considers herself a bit of a super hero, and has the courage to back it up.

Bio: At a young age, Zoey, along with many of her friends, had been abducted whilst out playing in the forest. When they blindfolds were removed, they found themselves in a dingy underground complex filled with other Pokémon. Unbeknownst to Zoey, She had just been abducted by a gang who turned children into stink slaves and sold them for profit.

At the same time, the gang had also attempted to discipline her into doing everything demanded of them by a "master". Though many others eventually broke, including some of Zoey's friends, the torture only seemed to harden the young Emolga, and make her more determined to get out of there. Unfortunately, despite it being full of thugs and faulty equipment, the place was fairly well run by it's brutal leaders. Escape seemed impossible, that is, until Zoey made note that the cells that she and everyone were kept in were electronic. being an electric type, Maybe she could do something about it.

Her first attempts bore no fruit however. As she tried time and time again to overload the cell with electricity, nothing seemed to work, no matter how good she got at firing it off. In fact nothing seemed to work, even as others tried it with their own moves, and with most of the prisoners consisting of children, nobody knew anything strong enough to break the bars. To top it all off, the resulting punishments given to those who tried to escape their cells quickly stopped many from even wanting to try. It never stopped Zoey however who continued desperately trying to think of a way out, even whilst being tortured.

Eventually, an idea struck her. If overloading the cells didn't work, then maybe she could find a way to power them down instead. Night after night, the girl spend her time focusing on the electrical currents of her cell, learning them. After that, she began to press her cheeks against the door, trying to establish her own electrical network with it. After she finally succeeded, the next part of how to actually drain the power from the cell began. Night after night, she trained herself on pulling in electrical currents, rather than releasing them.

One day, it finally worked! With great focus, she began to draw all the power out of her cell, and the area around her, into herself. Once the cell was sufficiently powered down, the door swung open, and Zoey made her great escape. Of course, such an act didn't go unnoticed. As Zoey attempted to free the others, she was caught and pursued through the facility. Desperate to get away from them, she dove into whatever doors she could in hopes of finding a way around them. One such room was a storage room, and the inside was filled with all the foods and chemicals the gang used to make themselves as foul smelling as they could. With only one way out and a mob of angry thugs after her, Zoey had no choice. She quickly began ingesting the food and sticking herself with chemicals, desperate to make herself strong enough to fight. When the gang finally managed to bust into the room, they were met with the foulest stink they'd ever experienced. At the cost of destroying her presentability, Zoey had become overwhelmingly foul smelling, and strong enough to fight her way out.

After freeing the prisoners and leading them to escape, Zoey fled the facility and never looked back. Though overwhelmed by everything that had happened, with the praises and thankfulness of the others, Zoey felt quite good about herself. However, one issue still remained. what she had done to herself in the facility was permanent. no matter what she tried, she was always foul smelling and gassy. Fortunately, this was no issue her parents couldn't overcome as she was welcomed home with open arms, but presenting herself in public became a chore, and she couldn't go anywhere without feeling humiliated. It was then that she decided that if she couldn't do anything to remove her smell, she could at least make the most of it, and use it to help others as she had in the facility.

With that, Zoey began using her stink to fight off criminals and punks around town, taking satisfaction in helping others. However, when news of the tournament reached her ears, she grew curious and made her way out to give it a look.

Quada (Swoobat)
Male

Quada is an adventurous Swoobat who lives alone in the woods, crafting potions and elixirs in hope to find the key to immortality. Being so focused on his work, he rarely had time to bathe, meaning his musk was unbearable. One of his mixtures came with a very strange side effect. Horrid flatulence. Of course, at the time, he didn’t care, as it wasn’t the “Fountain of Youth” he was looking for.
Eventually, he started running low on ingredients, so he went to the nearest city. This city happened to be home to a large arena where the “Smelly Pokemon Tournament” takes place. Quada suddenly had a realization. With all the prize money, he could fund his research indefinitely! And with his already terrible body odor and the new flatulence enhancing potion he had made, he thought there was no way he could lose!

Stink Stats
Feet: Bad

Body Musk: Deadly x2
Butt (Without Farting): Deadly x2
Breath: Bad

Stink resistance (70 out of 100)

Any special abilities

Potion Crafting: Quada is able to craft potions using the ingredients in his belt. Depending on the ingredients he uses, he can cause different effects. Some offensive, some defensive. With them he is able to immobilize the enemy with ice, or confuse the enemy with small explosives. He can also create a cloud of smoke to hide himself. But the most important mixture is the one that increases the power and stench of his gasses, taking the stink stat for hit farts from Rancid to Deadly x5. Of course, he needs time to drink it, or else it goes to waste. And he can’t drink it while flying.

Clause is a pretentious, rich Audino who inherited a large fortune at a young age. This has led to him being incredibly spoiled and bratty, often taking it out on his servants. As he got older, he learned of more ways to punish his servants. He hated bathing, and he used this to torture the innocent helpers. Ice Beam: Clause’s secondary method of pinning enemies if his gravity is not an option. Fairly simple, he attempts to freeze the enemy to the ground, leaving them open for an attack.

As said before. she only seems innocent, In reality she is extremely manipulative and tends to be very cheap, even getting to the point of begging, flirting and even pretend to cry just in order to achieve victory by lowering her opponents' guard even if such antics might backfire on her.

After defeating titus she became a champion, oddly enough, even after she became a chamipion she still did not evolved to a zoroark. yet. what she lacks on size, now she haves it on stench. Body Musk:Ungodly

Breath:Ungodly x 2

Stink resistance (50 of 100)

(Special) Silent but deadly: While she rarely uses her illusion abilities, she does haves one trick with then, the trick consist on her using her illusion to make herself vanish, then unleashing a big fart up to her enemy's nose while it is unable to see her.

(Special 2) Illusion pin down: She uses her ability to change the landscape and trick the opponent to remain still and sit on its face easily (Takes down her resistance by half due to her having to focus, which sharpens her senses.)

-Attract: Will make her rival fall in love with her temporarily.

(extra)Weak spots: She cannot stand any breath stench that is worse than her own. becoming way slower and easier to pin down if she is forced to sniff from up close.

15521.content:
1. Contestant: Denka the Lycanroc (Midnight form), Champion

2. Gender: Male

3. Brief character description:
Hailing from Alola, Denka was once a smelly little Rockruff, with a penchant for fighting and trouble making. He would always bully pokemon he thought were weaker than him, delighting in their humiliation and the feeling of being stronger than them. In truth, this came from his family; being the runt of the litter in a Lycanroc Midnight pack was not very easy, and he was often beaten and stinked out by his siblings. Sick of their treatment of him, Denka left them to train. Doing so day and night on every weak pokemon he could find, it wasn't long before he evolved. With his new found strength and increased stink, Denka set out to find somewhere he could prove himself.

Being the runt of his pack, Denka is a bit on the smaller side for a male Lycanroc Midnight. However, his pack is known for it's strength, and Denka is very well bred, being the offspring of two of the pack's mightiest members. In other words, despite his stature, he is still very physically powerful. Being the runt also made him think a bit harder about fighting and training, giving him slightly better intelligence than other Lycanrocs.

In one of his very starting bouts, Denka met Drought, a Braixen Champion who is a master magician. After nearly getting easily beaten, Drought offered to use his powers on Denka to make him stronger. Denka greedily accepted, and with his newfound strengths, easily crushed Drought. After taking the champion serum, Denka has become even more powerful, both in terms of stink and strength. Denka now lives in his champion suite rather than in the crappy shack he lived in before. However, he took all of his old shack's "charm" with him; his new room is already a mess!

4. Stink stats
Feet: Deadly X7
Farts: Deadly X3
Body Musk: Deadly X5
Butt (Without Farting): Deadly X5
Breath: Deadly

5. Stink resistance (70 out of 100)

6. Any special abilities:

Confidence: As long as Denka is in control of his fight, he will perform well. In other words, if he is doing well and beating his opponent, he fights better. If he begins to lose control and starts losing, he will begin to panic. In this state, he fights more crazily and violently, but his overall performance drops. His stink resistance also drops the more he panics.

Runt: Denka is sensitive about his height. It's not easy for pokemon who aren't used to seeing Lycanrocs to notice, however Denka hates being taunted about his height at all. Taunting him will speed up his drop into panic mode.

Female Weak: Denka despises being bested by females; a lot of female Lycanrocs in his pack were especially cruel to him. That being said, Denka gets frustrated more quickly if he's losing to a female.

Hypnosis: Thanks to Drought's magic, Denka now has a hypnotizing gaze attack! It's very powerful, but requires time to use, and the opponent has to stare into Denka's eyes while they work their mojo.

Size Control: Also thanks to Drought's magic, Denka can control both his and his opponent's size! This requires a bit of energy to use, and is prone to backfiring if Denka is confused, but other than that it's a pretty straightforward change. The more drastic the size change, the more energy Denka uses.

7. Sexy stuff is allowed. Preferably females, but can be fooled pretty easily by traps/girly boys. As a writer, I prefer to play sub, but Denka can easily be dom or sub depending on how the fight went and the mood he is in (although he will never admit to liking being dominated).

15522.content:
1. Name: Alfonse (Alfo) the Chespin (normal)

2. Gender: Male

3. Character Bio:
Alfo was born to a family of knights in a far away kingdom. Soon after he was born, his Mother left the family, and he was raised by his Chestnaught Father and Quilladin Brother. From a young age, he was brought up learning how to be a knight: he was taught to be kind and chivalrous, and taught how to fight in order to defend the weak. While Alfo took these lessons to heart, he didn't want to stay in the kingdom his entire life; it turns out his Mother's wanderlust passed down to him. When he told his Father he desired to travel, he was given a stern "No!". However, Alfo didn't give up. He tried numerous times to sneak out, although he was caught every time. Finally, Alfo's Father realized that keeping his son here was never going to change how the kid felt, and decided to allow him to leave. On the day of Alfo's departure, his family gifted him a necklace; it was a tad simple, as it was just a stone tied into a cord collar, but his Father explained it as "Something to help you learn more about the world, and who you are." Little did Alfo know that the stone was an Everstone...

Alfo has been journeying for a long time now, and has been meeting people and making friends along the way. He wants to find somewhere to stay for a while, but will keep him entertained with a lot of things to do. Eventually, he wandered into the SPT, and figured he'd give it a shot; after all, he could get pretty smelly on his travels. His personality is generally friendly, unless you are "evil" or pick on the weak. He is shy around girls, however, since his Mother left so early in his life and was brought up learning the code of chivalry. He desperately wants to evolve and become stronger.

Debuff Resistance: While he was naturally gifted with high resistance, traveling and exposing himself to many different situations gave Alfo a pretty high tolerance to many of the negative status effects of the world. Those around his power level will struggle to get anything to work on him, however, those more powerful than Alfo will still be able to get debuffs to work after a few tries. The only status he is still fully weak to is Attract, due to the fact that he is shy around girls and doesn't really know what to do around them.

High Guard: Alfo was taught how to defend himself effectively from a young age; as such, he is good at guarding himself from physical attacks. Since there isn't too much of a defense against smells other than blocking the nose, those are still perfectly effective against him.

EXP Back Up: Alfo has been journeying for a while now: he should ha e evolved at least once by now, if not twice. The Everstone he wears on a cord collar, however, is preventing this. If that collar were to ever be removed...

3. Character Bio
Stella always had a fascination in horrid smells, but she could never put her flipper on why. She was raised in a rich and sophisticated environment, where everyone was as clean and good smelling as a shimmering mermaid, yet she loved having the breath smell of raw fish. She would do her best to find the most rotten sea creature that was edible, make sure that her tail was coated in whatever was in the nearby dirty river, and would hide during bath time to enjoy her precious odor. But when her parents caught her, they forced her to suppress the stink she was so proud of. She felt awful after losing her stink, and never found it again for a while due to the new hygiene plan.

So, Stella forgot about her old passion, her old lust for the putrid scent. She continued her singing lessons with minty breath, always kept her tail scented with a bow on it, and learned to savor every bath time. She strutted in her new perfume-scented body and never tooted, ever. She became the prim and proper Primarina her parents always wanted her to be, and she was happy with it. Though, on one faithful day, she drank some very mysterious water.

Overnight, she felt different, felt like something was off. When she got out of bed to check it out, she noticed something under her tail, she had legs! She stumbled, trying to get use to her new way of movement, then she thought, what would her parents think of her Anthro daughter!? It's not like she could hide it, they were so thick that her butt was ginormous. Stella knew at that moment that she had to run away.

She escaped to an alleyway in the town's market, ashamed and feeling like she was a freak. The Anthro Primarina only stopped thinking of that when she saw something across the alleyway and on the street. "Stink performers," as they called themselves, could be smelled from a mile away as they danced with their ungodly, smelly, farting butts and sang with loud burps. The runaway watched from the alley with a disgusted face, it was so horrid! Out of nowhere though, one of the performers spotted her in her grossed out state, beckoning her over. Stella approached. The beckoning Pokemon then immediately made a tune out of guttural burping, pumping out deadly odors that would knock out anyone, yet Stella only gagged, then smiled. At that moment, something reawakened inside of her, something that was waiting inside for a long time. She returned the favor to the stinky Pokemon with a burp song of her own. The smell could use some work, but her burp singing was spectacular with her years of singing practice. The performers took her under their smelly wing.

Her fascination blossomed again as she became surrounded by stink everyday, all of the while she grew a great resistance to it through exposure and her natural passion for the odor. 1553332222211.content:
1. Cleo (Mienshao) (Anthro)

2. Female

3. Character Bio

Cleo was once an ordinary Mienshao in an ancient land. She used to think that upsetting her friends was the worst thing that could happen in her life. However, one day would change all of that. A Pokémon of immense power suddenly showed up to the world. Many Pokémon hiding away in the edges of the world wouldn't know the Pokémon, however it made its presence known very well to those in the mainland. It demanded that the Pokémon hail it as a goddess for the rest of their lives. Many refused, and the "goddess" would punish them by devouring legions upon legions of Pokémon it deemed unworthy.

Civilizations crumbled, old norms were forgotten, and soon, the only superpower to the world was the great "goddess." Cleo lost everyone she knew and loved, and was forced to grow up into a deadly tool of the goddess. And become a tool, she did. The few remnants of civilization taught her to be a gatherer for the goddess, a warrior taught to fetch Pokémon the goddess is hungry for through any means necessary. She quickly learned that her prowess and stench served as very effective skills in incapacitating soon-to-be prey. Her teachings made her to be quick, precise, and powerful, though not particularly defensive.

She used to be a bright eyed girl, but the goddess' reign turned her into little more than an unfeeling tool that only exists to sere the goddess. She no longer empathizes, she doesn't even relish in her dominance, she just does.

4. Stink Stats
Feet: Putrid
Farts: Deadly x4
Body Odor: Horrid
Butt: Deadly
Breath: Pretty Bad

5. Stink Resistance: 72/100

6. Special Abilities:

Stench Screen: Cleo can surround herself in some of her gas. The moment she does, she seems to disappear, leaving behind a cloud of her horrid gas. She can then reappear elsewhere in a similar cloud of gas, which dissipates after she appears instead of lingering like when she initially disappears. She tends to do this whenever someone's about to strike her.

Sleeve Grapple: Cleo can whip one of her sleeve-like extensions at a foe. Whips usually result in her sleeve wrapping around someone's appendage, typically the neck, and her either pulling them towards her or pulling herself towards them. A successful wrapping can usually lead to her pulling them down to her butt for an additional attack.

Stealth Stink: Cleo's ninja-like abilities come in great for her to deliver a lethal strike upon someone before they could realize it. If she evades her foe's sight long enough and sneaks up behind them, she can bearhug an opponent from behind and completely surround them in her foul gas.

1. Stella (Primarina) (Anthro)

2. Female

3. Character Bio
Stella always had a fascination in horrid smells, but she could never put her flipper on why. She was raised in a rich and sophisticated environment, where everyone was as clean and good smelling as a shimmering mermaid, yet she loved having the breath smell of raw fish. She would do her best to find the most rotten sea creature that was edible, make sure that her tail was coated in whatever was in the nearby dirty river, and would hide during bath time to enjoy her precious odor. But when her parents caught her, they forced her to suppress the stink she was so proud of. She felt awful after losing her stink, and never found it again for a while due to the new hygiene plan.

So, Stella forgot about her old passion, her old lust for the putrid scent. She continued her singing lessons with minty breath, always kept her tail scented with a bow on it, and learned to savor every bath time. She strutted in her new perfume-scented body and never tooted, ever. She became the prim and proper Primarina her parents always wanted her to be, and she was happy with it. Though, on one faithful day, she drank some very mysterious water.

Overnight, she felt different, felt like something was off. When she got out of bed to check it out, she noticed something under her tail, she had legs! She stumbled, trying to get use to her new way of movement, then she thought, what would her parents think of her Anthro daughter!? It's not like she could hide it, they were so thick that her butt was ginormous. Stella knew at that moment that she had to run away.

She escaped to an alleyway in the town's market, ashamed and feeling like she was a freak. The Anthro Primarina only stopped thinking of that when she saw something across the alleyway and on the street. "Stink performers," as they called themselves, could be smelled from a mile away as they danced with their ungodly, smelly, farting butts and sang with loud burps. The runaway watched from the alley with a disgusted face, it was so horrid! Out of nowhere though, one of the performers spotted her in her grossed out state, beckoning her over. She was about to walk off defiantly when this happened, but something repressed inside sent her towards the scent.

Stella approached. The beckoning Pokemon then immediately made a tune out of guttural burping, pumping out deadly odors that would knock out anyone, yet Stella only gagged, then smiled. At that moment, something reawakened inside of her, something that was waiting inside for a long time. She returned the favor to the stinky Pokemon with a burp song of her own. The smell could use some work, but her burp singing was spectacular with her years of singing practice. The performers took her under their smelly wing.

Her fascination blossomed again as she became surrounded by stink everyday, all of the while she grew a great resistance to it through exposure and her natural passion for the odor. Stella was taught the art of burp singing, rhythmic farting, twerking and seductive, yet smelly dancing. She became one with the group, entertaining and incapacitate anyone witnessing their horrid yet beautiful sounds and movements. She finally found her place and found glory in the cheers of her audience, but she craved more.

One day, Stella finally found what she was looking for. A poster for the stink tournament. But she would only join to entertain, because she loved the praise people gave to her stink, praise she could have never have gotten when she was younger.

The show over competition: who cares about winning? As long as the audience is enjoying themselves, then she is happy. Whenever she is hit by a attack, she will try to make it look part of the performance, or even turn it around by countering it!

It also smells worst and can be used with her singing.

Beautiful looks: she still retains some things from her noble years, like her gorgeous looks! Using her beauty that she has somehow retained on the streets, she can make some enemies go head over heels for her.

Must retain beauty: she strongly cares about keeping her lovely looks, Stella believes that odor should be smelled, but never seen. Even on the streets, she has tried to keep as clean as possible.

155333222223211.content:
1. Name: Alfonse (Alfo) the Chespin (normal)

2. Gender: Male

3. Character Bio:
Alfo was born to a family of knights in a far away kingdom. Soon after he was born, his Mother left the family, and he was raised by his Chestnaught Father and Quilladin Brother. From a young age, he was brought up learning how to be a knight: he was taught to be kind and chivalrous, and taught how to fight in order to defend the weak. While Alfo took these lessons to heart, he didn't want to stay in the kingdom his entire life; it turns out his Mother's wanderlust passed down to him. When he told his Father he desired to travel, he was given a stern "No!". However, Alfo didn't give up. He tried numerous times to sneak out, although he was caught every time. Finally, Alfo's Father realized that keeping his son here was never going to change how the kid felt, and decided to allow him to leave. On the day of Alfo's departure, his family gifted him a necklace; it was a tad simple, as it was just a stone tied into a cord collar, but his Father explained it as "Something to help you learn more about the world, and who you are." Little did Alfo know that the stone was an Everstone...

Alfo has been journeying for a long time now, and has been meeting people and making friends along the way. He wants to find somewhere to stay for a while, but will keep him entertained with a lot of things to do. Eventually, he wandered into the SPT, and figured he'd give it a shot; after all, he could get pretty smelly on his travels. His personality is generally friendly, unless you are "evil" or pick on the weak. He is shy around girls, however, since his Mother left so early in his life and was brought up learning the code of chivalry. He desperately wants to evolve and become stronger.

4. Stink Stats: (On this Scale: Good, Unscented, Slightly bad, Bad, Pretty Bad Very Bad, Rancid Unbearable, Horrid, Putrid, Ungodly, Deadly, Lethal)
Feet: Ungodly X2
Farts: Putrid
Body Odor: Putrid
Butt: Ungodly
Breath Horrid
Other: None

5. Stink Resistance (45 out of 100)

6. Special Abilities:

Debuff Resistance: While he was naturally gifted with high resistance, traveling and exposing himself to many different situations gave Alfo a pretty high tolerance to many of the negative status effects of the world. Those around his power level will struggle to get anything to work on him, however, those more powerful than Alfo will still be able to get debuffs to work after a few tries. The only status he is still fully weak to is Attract, due to the fact that he is shy around girls and doesn't really know what to do around them.

High Guard: Alfo was taught how to defend himself effectively from a young age; as such, he is good at guarding himself from physical attacks. Since there isn't too much of a defense against smells other than blocking the nose, those are still perfectly effective against him.

EXP Back Up: Alfo has been journeying for a while now: he should ha e evolved at least once by now, if not twice. The Everstone he wears on a cord collar, however, is preventing this. If that collar were to ever be removed...

7. Sex with both genders is fine. Alfo is definitely a sub though.

155333222223222112.content:
1. Axel (Roserade) (Anthro)

2. Gender: Male

3. Character Bio: Axel is a noted, but vastly unknown figure that is known to lurk around the town. Often appearing very shy, Axel spent most of his days alone. Typically, on the rare occasion anyone wanted to visted him, he was rumored to be found wandering the forest at night. While no one can confirm this, mutiple fools who went out searching for him were found passed out, in a middle of a clearing coated in a humid, honey like fog. Their minds scrambled by thick aromas as a bipedal, shadowy figure could be seen standing and quickly vanishing.

On paper, Axel was monster. A reputation built up due to the number of attacks associated with his name. In truth though, Axel was scared. Never growing up within a pokemon society as a young budew had left him unable to socialize with many around him. On top of that, he as a roselia was forcefully captured and trained by a cruel human. Eventually due to the poke ball he was in breaking, Axel escaped ending up within the town.

One day he was drinking from the local river as normal. Moments latter he got dizzy, a stomach churning feeling overcame him and he quickly passed out. Upon awaking, he found himself in a weird wooden structure, much like the ones on town. Too much so. He quickly realized where he was and tried to get up. It was then he noticed his height had grown to that of his former trainer while the rest of his already human like body didn't go through changes.

Now, Axel is trying to adjust to pokemon society. There was only one place a pokemon with his reputation could go: The Smelly Pokemon Tournament!

4. Stink Stats: (On this Scale: Good, Unscented, Slightly bad, Bad, Pretty Bad Very Bad, Rancid Unbearable, Horrid, Putrid, Ungodly, Deadly, Lethal)

Feet: Horrid
Farts: Horrid
Body Odor: Good
Butt: Unbearable
Breath: Rancid
Red Flower Toxin*: Ungodly
Blue Flower Toxin*: Pretty bad

5. Stink Resistance (out of 100)

55/100

6. Special Abilities:
Sweet Charm: Axel raises up his pits and unleashes a sweet, honey like aroma. Most who end up sniffing it becomes charmed and are more valuable to Axel's attacks.

Red Flower Toxin: One of Axel''s bunches of flowers. He can push out some of the thickest, most rancid stench air out of it right into unsuspecting pokemon

Blue Flower Toxin: Axel's more deadly flower bunch. While these lacked the punch his red toxic flowers have, they process the ability to release a toxin that effects each pokemon differently. Most of the time it bends pokemom to his will, but can also put his opponents to sleep or even poison them.

6.5 Weaknesses:
Flower hands: Axel's hands are well...flowers. this means he can't grab onto things very well, much less at all.

Limited Aromas: Each use of both unleashing his Sweet charm or one of his flower toxins drains both Axel's gas and stamina. Over using these moves will leave him tired, dizzy, and unable to fight back.

7. Doesn't mind sex at all, as most go wild at his scents.

info.brief_description: A redone version of the Smelly Pokémon Tournament!
info.description:
Hello and welcome once again, or for the first time, to the Smelly Pokémon Tournament!

Now you’re probably wondering why I’ve made another one of these darned things, and the answer is quite simplicated! The old one is over three years old, cluttered, and I think I have a better format to do the things with now! Also, there are a lot of characters who are either no longer in use, or who desperately need an “I’m a better writer than I was three years ago,” update. Most of which are my own characters. That said, you can still complete any ongoing matches, or start new ones, in the old version.

So anywho, time for a somewhat lengthy description of the thing!

So, first off, it’s technically not a tournament. More of an…arena. However, I will keep the name for sentimental reasons! In this tournament, Pokémon try to knock each other out with their various odors. Whoever passes out first loses! The winning Pokémon gets prize monies, and if they so desire…the loser. Some rules have been changed, however, and these things will be gone over later!

One of the main things that’s different this time around is that now, characters will be grouped to their author, instead of just thrust into a huge line that’s impossible to navigate. Also, whenever a new character is made, you should try to remember to make the chapter title the character’s name and species.

Now, most of you probably already know the character bio format, but for those of you who don’t…here ya go!

1. Name (Species) (Anthro or Normal) (Champion, if applicable)

2. Gender

3. Character Bio

4. Stink Stats: (On this Scale: Good, Unscented, Slightly bad, Bad, Pretty Bad Very Bad, Rancid Unbearable, Horrid, Putrid, Ungodly, Deadly, Lethal)
Feet:
Farts:
Body Odor:
Butt:
Breath
Other: (Please specify!)

5. Stink Resistance (out of 100)

6. Special Abilities:

7. If Sex is allowed with the character, what gender they prefer, and what genders are allowed to partake in the sexings.

Now, you’ll notice that there’s a couple things different this time around. First off, smexings in the arena are no longer prohibited! So long as stink remains a main focus, you can stuff your opponent with your dong all day long!

And another new feature…anthros! Thanks to the tournament’s resident monster/mad scientist Sylveon, Swyft, a chemical was "accidentally" released into the town’s water supply, turning some of the town’s denizens bipedal and slightly humanlike! So uh…yeah, you can have anthropomorphic ‘mons now too!

Now, the stink scale is going to remain mostly the same. Except that base stats cannot ever be above Deadly x20 unless you have gone through the Dungeon of The Secret Stat and gotten yourself one of the coveted Lethal stat vials. Speaking of, I’ll be remaking the Society story as well soon. And note that I said that BASE stats can’t be above Deadly x20 (which honestly, should be enough to like…knock out a whole restaurant.) Characters can have abilities that can raise their stink above this soft cap under certain conditions. For example, Swift and Swyft’s Drain Kiss power.

Other rule-y things are still the same though. Things like scat, vore, watersports, excessive amounts of violence and gore, and death are still prohibited. Other things may be added to this list of prohibited things as time goes on, but this will work for now! And any fetishes not listed here can be included, but ya should prooobably ask first.

Now, since this is kind of an RP story, I’m not going to force anyone to write a certain length. After all, some of us can write like…5,000 character responses while others can’t. I do ask that you try to take your writing partner’s abilities into consideration and try to match pace, but if you can’t, it’s perfectly fine.

And one last thing: Champions. Now, the Champions are the upper echelon of combatants. They’re stronger than your average contestant, and they get access to all the nice toys. Champions get the nicest suites in the hotel that houses Tournament contenders, access to the special gymnasium and cafeteria, both of which are designed to make the Champions smell even worse, and access to stinkslave room service. Now, normal contestants can be strong, but I’d say that no single stat should be above…Deadly x4 or so. Champions however, you can make them reek to high heaven and back!

Addenum: I just realized I forgot to add this. You have to BEAT a current champion before you can make your character into one.

Well, I think that’s everything for now. Have fuuuuun!
